thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 24 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Biomed Lublin Adopts Strategy For 2018-2022

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Biomed Lublin Adopts Strategy For 2018-2022
text:
BIOMED LUBLIN WYTWORNIA SUROWIC I SZCZEPIONEK SA:
* ADOPTS STRATEGY 2018-2022
* PLANS TO INVEST IN CONSTRUCTION OF NEW PRODUCTION PLANT * IDENTIFIES THREE STRATEGIC PRODUCTS: ONKO BCG, ANTI-TUBERCULOSIS VACCINE BCG AND DISTREPTAZA
* CONSTRUCTION OF NEW PRODUCTION PLANT WILL ALLOW TO INCREASE PRODUCTION VOLUME OF STRATEGIC PRODUCTS
* SEES YEARLY REVENUE EXCEEDING 100 MILLION ZLOTYS AFTER IMPLEMENTATION OF STRATEGIC PLANS
* ESTIMATES INVESTMENT COSTS AT ABOUT 150 MILLION ZLOTYS, PLANS TO GET 60% OF FINANCING FROM EU SUBSIDIES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
